title: Servo Component Definition
description: A servo motor WipperSnapper component for use in Adafruit IO

published.description: When true, the component appears for all users in the Component Picker. If false or absent, the component is hidden behind a Developer Mode switch in the Component Picker.

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of the servo component.

frequency.description: The desired frequency of the PWM signal, in Hz.

minPulseWidth.description: The minimum pulse width of the servo, in uS.

maxPulseWidth.description: The maximum pulse width of the servo, in uS.
